about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 206: Zombies

Another ghoulishly great time lurks within this pack of zeds! Locked inside are 27 of the newest undead, from putrescent prisoners and worm riddled wretches to seaweed strangled sailors and even an squishy spacefarer! Grab this pack of ghastly ghouls and add some more unlife into your next session! Worm ridden or dry and leathery there’s a corpse for everyone!
